job.title: Senior Data Scientist-NLP
job.description: <p>Our client is a household name dedicated to making an impact on their customer base. This global firm is looking a Senior Data Scientist to work in their fast-paced environment and completely transform the customer experience. </p><p><br></p><p>You will leverage your strong collaboration skills and ability to extract valuable insights from highly complex data sets to ask the right questions and find the right answers.&nbsp;You will focus on using state-of-the art Machine Learning and AI tools</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Play a crucial role in delivering advanced technology solutions that addresses real-world, data-driven needs</li><li>Design and develop&nbsp;pipelines, reports,&nbsp;dashboards and framework that monitor&nbsp;and analyze&nbsp;performance of the AI Voice Agents</li><li>Employ advanced statistical modeling to analyze large data sets,&nbsp;create&nbsp;dashboards&nbsp;and&nbsp;derive insights&nbsp;to guide key business,&nbsp;product&nbsp;and engineering&nbsp;decisions</li></ul><p><br></p><p>.</p><p><strong>Skills:</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>BS in Computer Science,&nbsp;Mathematics, Statistics&nbsp;or a related quantitative discipline</li><li>5+&nbsp;years of experience in data science or analytics using Python and SQL and working with big data</li><li>Excellent analytical skills along with ability to solve business problems and apply innovative though leadership</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Compensation:</strong>&nbsp;Strong Package, Bonus, equity and Benefits.</p>
